nodes.bodyText: Maybe it's me, but the name is kinda confusing. Maybe something like AdditionalConfigSourceProviderBuildItem ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+package io.quarkus.deployment.builditem;
+
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.spi.ConfigSourceProvider;
+
+import io.quarkus.builder.item.MultiBuildItem;
+
+/**
+ * Build item to use when an additional {@link ConfigSourceProvider} needs to be
+ * registered to the Bootstrap Config setup.
+ * This is needed because during Bootstrap Config setup, we don't auto-discover providers
+ * but we do want for example the YAML provider to be enabled.
+ */
+public final class AdditionalBootstrapConfigProviderBuildItem extends MultiBuildItem {

nodes.bodyText: You have a point, I'll make it AdditionalBootstrapConfigSourceProviderBuildItem
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: We generally don't pass classes around in BuildItems
